name: Pic-o-Beat
description:
PIC-o-BEAT is a rhythm game that really paints a picture
draw pixel art while keeping rhythm with 8 unique songs and 48 pictures for you to draw

Menu Controls:
- arrow keys to move around menus
- Z to go back
- X to go to next

Control Scheme 0:
- Arrow Keys - Yellow
- Z or X - Blue

Control Scheme 1:
- Z,Down,Right - Yellow
- X,Up,Left - Blue
